li.label: awful force temple
li.description: This is a disrespect to our holocron, it could get ruined.

li.label: dull force temple
li.description: The temple needs work - I can't focus properly there.

li.label: mediocre force temple
li.description: Our temple needs work, but has promise.

li.label: knight force temple
li.description: Our temple is very impressive - I feel the force there.

li.label: elite knight's force temple
li.description: Our temple is amazing - The place is strong with the force.

li.label: master's force temple
li.description: Our temple is magnificent! A truly excellent place to meditate on the force.

li.label: grand master's force temple
li.description: Our temple must be one of the greatest in history. A sublime locus of the force.
